oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Confederate Wiley Bartlette at Vicksburg
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sgt. Bartlette was from Claiborne Co. and served in Co. H, 61st TN Mtd. Inf. He is writing his wife Sallie from Vicksburg: "My dear Sallie knothing is not any satisfaction unless I could get to see you and the little children them dear little ones�" He; was captured on Big Black River on May 16 or 17, 1863 and sent to Point Lookout, Delaware prison camp.
